data.sec1Desc1: Intelligent home automation allows you to protect your home and your loved ones easily. Remote alert systems and one-touch security surveillance keep you rest assured that your home is always protected.
data.sec2Desc1: Protect your home from intruders with our intelligent security solutions. Once configured, door/window and motion sensors notify you when someone tries to break into your home when you’re away. As an expansion to the range, we also have wireless doorbells and intelligent locks that provide an additional level of security and mental peace.
data.sec3Desc1: Keep a tab on your home, even while you’re away in the office or on a vacation. With intelligent CCTV cameras that provide round-the-clock monitoring, staying connected with what matters is easy.
data.sec3Desc2: The surveillance cameras can be installed standalone or can be configured to secure a covered area.
data.sec4Desc1: Get instant alerts on your smartphone when your home is hit by fire, flood, or any other disaster. You can also configure the central automation system to take corrective action instantly.
data.sec4Desc2: For eg. Trigger an alarm, turn on the lights to capture attention, or automatically disable all locks in the home for quick evacuation.
data.sec5Desc1: Use your smartphone instead of the classic key. Control your door with your phone. Maximum convenience without compromising safety. Share digital keys with friends and family and keep track off who has come and gone.
data.sec6Desc1: Your wellbeing is important to us. Ushering in this new era of preventive health. Now Monitor C02 Levels, humidity and temperature at the palm of your hand. Also monitor and optimise illumination levels.

seo.title: Smart Home Solutions in Dubai, UAE | Syncrow AE |
seo.description: Connect all your functional needs to a network with Syncrow Smart Home Automation Solutions. Begin a smarter home lifestyle with Syncrow. Speak to our Expert Today.
